channel.title: Project TurkeyScape©
channel.description:
[center]Project TurkeyScape©[/center]
I am looking to start up a server. But cannot host. I can code a little but I'm looking for somebody who has experience in coding servers. Or good knowledge of C++ and javascript. The jobs of the person who accepts will be...
[ul][li]Help me create a server.[/li] [li]Host the server.[/li] [li]Suggest Ideas For the server.[/li] [li]Help Administrate the forums i will setup.[/li][/ul]
For this i will give equal administration to the server and to the forums. Everything will be agreed by both and if one disagrees with the other the idea/suggestion cannot be completed.
I am on msn most of the time.
It's ruinedcityhelper@hotmail.co.uk
Add me on that if you want to discuss applying for the job.
Or simply just post back on here.
Many Thanks :) Randrews A.K.A Turkeyt00th

item.title: Project TurkeyScape©
item.dc:creator: @randrews randrews
item.description:
@randrews wrote:

[center]Project TurkeyScape©[/center]

I am looking to start up a server. But cannot host. I can code a little but I’m looking for somebody who has experience in coding servers. Or good knowledge of C++ and javascript. The jobs of the person who accepts will be…

[ul][li]Help me create a server.[/li]
[li]Host the server.[/li]
[li]Suggest Ideas For the server.[/li]
[li]Help Administrate the forums i will setup.[/li][/ul]

For this i will give equal administration to the server and to the forums. Everything will be agreed by both and if one disagrees with the other the idea/suggestion cannot be completed.

I am on msn most of the time.

It’s ruinedcityhelper@hotmail.co.uk

Add me on that if you want to discuss applying for the job.

Or simply just post back on here.

Many Thanks
Randrews A.K.A Turkeyt00th
